name: 烈焰犬
description: 忠诚的守护者，全身燃烧着不灭的火焰。奔跑时会在身后留下灼热的足迹。

features: 深红色的鬃毛如火焰般飘动

ecology.habitat: 活火山地带和熔岩平原

image_prompts.design: A fierce hound-like creature with deep crimson mane flowing like flames. Fire rings encircle its legs, golden fire burns in its eyes. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges defining the muscular form, ink sketch texture on flame patterns, non-reflective surface with matte crimson and orange tones, powerful and loyal stance.
